Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.domain

Class Collaborator

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.domain.Collaborator
public class Collaborator extends Object
Represents a collaborator in the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • Collaborator

      public Collaborator(String name, String birthdate, String admissionDate, String address, int phoneNumber, String email, int taxpayerNumber, String identificationDocumentType, String identificationDocumentNumber, Job job)
      Constructs a collaborator with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the collaborator.
      birthdate - The birthdate of the collaborator (format: year/month/day).
      admissionDate - The admission date of the collaborator (format: year/month/day).
      address - The address of the collaborator (format: street, zipcode, city).
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the collaborator.
      email - The email of the collaborator.
      taxpayerNumber - The taxpayer number of the collaborator.
      identificationDocumentType - The type of identification document of the collaborator.
      identificationDocumentNumber - The identification document number of the collaborator.
      job - The job of the collaborator.

    • Collaborator

      email - The email address of the collaborator.
      taxpayerNumber - The taxpayer number of the collaborator.
      identificationDocumentType - The type of identification document.
      identificationDocumentNumber - The identification document number.
      job - The job of the collaborator.
      skills - The skills of the collaborator.

      Returns:

      Throws:
